statements: SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products;
SELECT product_name, carbon_footprint, category FROM eco_friendly_products;
SELECT product_name, sale_price FROM eco_friendly_products ORDER BY sale_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE units_sold > 10000;
SELECT product_name, category, carbon_footprint FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE sale_price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products ORDER BY product_id DESC, sale_price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, category, carbon_footprint FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY carbon_footprint DESC
SELECT AVG(sale_price) AS average_price, MAX(units_sold) AS max_units_sold FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE category = 'Kitchen Items'
SELECT product_name, sale_price, carbon_footprint FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE carbon_footprint >= 0.5 ORDER BY sale_price ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units_sold FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing')
SELECT * FROM eco_product_sales;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_amount FROM eco_product_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM eco_product_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM eco_product_sales WHERE product_name = 'Organic Strawberries';
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sale_date FROM eco_product_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM eco_product_sales WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount FROM eco_product_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, m.sales_growth, m.customer_satisfaction_rating FROM eco_product_sales p JOIN product_performance_metrics m ON p.product_id = m.product_id;
SELECT product_name, sales_amount, sale_date FROM eco_product_sales WHERE eco_friendly_score > 3 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(sales_amount) AS average_sales, MAX(sales_amount) AS max_sales, MIN(sales_amount) AS min_sales FROM eco_product_sales;
SELECT * FROM eco_products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM eco_products WHERE eco_certified = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM eco_products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM eco_products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, eco_certified FROM eco_products WHERE eco_certified = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM eco_products WHERE eco_certified = TRUE ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM eco_products WHERE category = 'Organic' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM eco_products GROUP BY category;
SELECT ep.product_name, SUM(sm.units_sold) AS total_units_sold, SUM(sm.revenue) AS total_revenue FROM eco_products ep JOIN sales_metrics sm ON ep.product_id = sm.product_id GROUP BY ep.product_name;

SELECT ep.product_name, pm.customer_rating, pm.market_share FROM eco_products ep JOIN performance_metrics pm ON ep.product_id = pm.product_id WHERE pm.market_share > 10 ORDER BY pm.market_share DESC, pm.customer_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM eco_products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM eco_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_id, SUM(units_sold) AS total_units FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM eco_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_data WHERE LENGTH(phone_number) > 0 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM eco_products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE quantity > 100 AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_data WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM eco_friendly_products;
SELECT sale_date, total_price, quantity_sold FROM sales;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers;
SELECT performance_rating, customer_satisfaction, product_id FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email, contact_phone FROM suppliers;
SELECT * FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE quantity < 50 AND category IN ('Home', 'Office') ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM eco_friendly_products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_name;

SELECT eco.product_name, sales.quantity_sold, metrics.customer_satisfaction FROM sales JOIN eco_friendly_products eco ON sales.product_id = eco.id JOIN performance_metrics metrics ON eco.id = metrics.product_id WHERE sales.quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY sales.quantity_sold DESC;
